name: The Way Home (itch)
description:
One strange evening, our nameless protagonist finds himself on top of a hill--dead-- with little to no memories to go off of. All he knows is that his purpose is to go home. 

Hello and welcome to my first game! This is a fairly quick (5 minutes or thereabouts),  simple visual novel with a little bit of point-and-click interactions. I've worked on this on and off for longer than I would like to admit, but it's finally done. Featuring!

  • A Visual Novel with 5 different endings!
  • Multiple choices that effects your ending!
  • Hidden paths. Cough.
  • Ghosts...talking ghosts.
  • Puns.
  • P L O T

I hope you enjoy this as much as I did making it!
